availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Owen Wesley France (Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Polly Pruitt France in Scott County, Virginia, on June 15, 1841. Father of Isabel France, Louanna France, Elbert France, Lewis France, Lemuel France, Nancy France, Alba France, Helen France, and Owen France. Farmer in Scott County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Jackson County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Scott County, Western District, p. 435B.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lee County, Coal Branch, p. 317A.
Early American Marriages: Virginia to 1850Dodd, Jordan et. al. Bountiful, UT: Precision Indexing Publishers.
